message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $120?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I'm looking to spend closer to $100. Would you be willing to consider that?
I understand you're looking to spend closer to $100, Bob, but I have to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $110. What do you think?
